law.catch_line: Funds, assets, obligations, and resources transferred to cabinet.
law.text: All funds, credits, assets, appropriations, outstanding obligations, personnel, equipment, wards, any and all resources or other tangible property, and any business or other matter undertaken or vested in the Department of Child Welfare, the Department of Economic Security, the Department of Health, the Department of Mental Health, the Commission on Aging, the Commission on Children and Youth, the Commission for Handicapped Children, the Office of Economic Opportunity, the Division of Disability Determination of the Department of Education, and the Employment Agency Licensure Program of the Department of Labor are hereby transferred to and vested in the cabinet.
law.history: Amended 1980 Ky. Acts ch. 118, sec. 10, effective July 15, 1980. -- Created 1974 Ky. Acts ch. 74, Art. VI, sec. 25.
